_header: Yet would I not the causer fared amiss
_description: A love lament — three stanzas rhyme royal

CULFf16.First Lines:
Yit wulde I nat the causer faryd a mysseffore all the good I
                        haue that euer y had or schallTher for y take myn auentoure I
                    wisseAs sche that hath for sakene Ioyus all…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…Syns that ȝe moste nedys departe me froIt ys to me a
                    verry dedly woo
CULFf16.Note:
Third line of st. 2 orig. omitted and added bottom f.
                    153v
